senses.definition: 特指由政府興建、營運嘅房屋群，亦即係公共屋邨（#公屋），主要由#房委會 同#房協 管理；同#居屋 唔同，居屋通常稱為屋苑，建築群嘅名亦都多數用「苑」命名（量詞：個／座） (housing estate (usually public housing estates in Hong Kong))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你唔好睇佢身光頸靚，佢住屋邨㗎咋！
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 tai2 keoi5 san1 gwong1 geng2 leng3, keoi5 zyu6 uk1 cyun1 gaa3 zaa3!
examples.translation: Don't be fooled by his luxury clothing. It turns out he lives in public housing!

senses.definition: 香港科技大學 嘅簡稱 (acronym and abbreviation of "The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 大缸；肚大過底同埋上高容器口、有咁上下深嘅容器（量詞：個） (urn)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jung6 ung3 gong1 jip3 zaa3 coi3

senses.definition: 掩埋、填塞、掩蓋 (用沙或泥土) (to bury, to clog up, to cover up (with sand or dirt))
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 堆起 (沙或泥土)成丘狀 (to heap up (sand or dirt) as a mound)

examples.text: 攞啲沙加啲水，就可以壅個城堡出嚟
examples.jyutping: lo2 di1 saa1 gaa1 di1 seoi2, zau6 ho2 ji5 ung1 go3 sing4 bou2 ceot1 lei4.
examples.translation: Mix sand and water together, and you can build a (sand) castle.

senses.definition: 家人；尤其指直屬嘅親人（父母、兄弟姊妹、子女）以及配偶（量詞：個） (family; family members; especially immediate relatives (parents, children, siblings, spouse))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 di1 uk1 kei2 jan4 hou2 hou3 haak3 gaa3.
examples.translation: My family members always welcome guests.

senses.definition: 用嚟裝#水 或#酒 嘅#陶器（量詞：個） (ceramics to be filled with water or wine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個甕一穿，啲酒漏晒出嚟。
examples.jyutping: go3 ung3 jat1 cyun1 di1 zau2 lau6 saai3 ceot1 lai4.
examples.translation: The wine leaks out of the urn once it's broken。

senses.definition: 用手向前用力去推郁佢 (to push; to shove; to jostle)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 各種嘅建築物，尤其是係畀人住嘅；係相對正式嘅講法 (building)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 車輛180度轉向，掉頭向相反方向行駛 ((of vehicles) to make a U-turn; to turn 180 degrees)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 物業嘅買賣合約，亦即係證明業主擁有座物業嘅法律文件（量詞：張） (deed)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 記得帶埋張屋契去律師樓辦手續啊！
examples.jyutping: gei3 dak1 daai3 maai4 zoeng1 uk1 kai3 heoi3 leot6 si1 lau4 baan6 sau2 zuk6 aa3!
examples.translation: Remember to take the deed of the house to the law firm to complete the formalities.

senses.definition: 長期居住嘅地方 (home)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 家庭 (family; family members)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 uk1 kei2 jau5 saam1 hing1 dai6 zi2 mui6.
examples.translation: I have 3 siblings in my family.

senses.definition: 一幢或者多幢住宅組成，一般附有生活、娛樂、交通及其他設施（量詞：個／座） (housing estate)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟住嘅建築物，可以指#平房 或者大廈#單位（量詞：間） (house; residential building; in Hong Kong, individual apartments within a building are also referred to as 屋)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: to move house; to relocate; to move to another residence

senses.definition: 屋頂坡面相交連接嘅部份（量詞：條） (ridge)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一間#屋 嘅頂部；冚著間屋上面嘅部分，可以遮擋太陽同雨水（量詞：個／層） (roof)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 屋頂底部邊沿往下垂嘅部分 (eaves)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 僭建嘅屋簷對路人構成危險。
examples.jyutping: cim5 gin3 ge3 uk1 sim4 deoi3 lou6 jan4 kau3 sing4 ngai4 him2.
examples.translation: Illegal eaves are dangerous to passers-by.

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#美國 #加州，鄰近#三藩市 (Oakland)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#紐西蘭 北島，係紐西蘭最大城市 (Auckland)

phonetic.original: uk1 lau6 gim1 fung4 je6 jyu5
jyutping: uk1 lau6 gim1 fung4 je6 jyu5
uk1 lau6 gim1 fung4 lin4 je6 jyu5

senses.definition: 形容災禍接住發生 (misfortunes never come singly; literally: the roof has a hole and then there is a rainy night)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: uk1 lau6 gim1 fung4 je6 jyu5
uk lau gim fung je jyu
uk1 lau6 gim1 fung4 lin4 je6 jyu5
uk lau gim fung lin je jyu

senses.definition: 將個人、將啲嘢#㧬 埋一邊 (to push someone or something aside)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋唔㧬開舊石頭行唔到前去㗎。
examples.translation: We can't go forward if we don't push the stone out of our way.

senses.definition: 一種蔬菜，屬番薯屬光萼組植物 (water spinach; ipomoea aquatica)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 屋嘅主人、擁有人 (house owner)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #房 或者#單位 嘅#租金 (rent, usu. for a room or an apartment)
senses.label: 名詞
